item.title: Guide to OECD’sTrade in Value Added (TiVA)Indicators, 2018 edition
item.description: The Organisation for Economic Co-operation and Development (OECD; French: Organisation de Coopération et de Développement Économiques, OCDE) is an intergovernmental economic organisation with 38 member countries.
